ygData.subject: Rejected value for 'userAgentTemplate'
ygData.msgSnippet: I m using Heritrix Engine 3.1.1-SNAPSHOT-20100915.040035. When I wrote user agent value as follow:

X-Yahoo-Profile: mahmoudmubarak@...

I'm using Heritrix Engine 3.1.1-SNAPSHOT-20100915.040035. When I wrote 
user agent value as follow:
<property name="userAgentTemplate"
          value="Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; archive.bibalex.org_bot 
+http://archive.bibalex.org/bot)"/>

and built, I got:
2010-11-04T14:25:51.130Z WARNING Field error in object 'metadata' on 
field 'userAgentTemplate': rejected value [Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; 
archive.bibalex.org_bot +http://archive.bibalex.org/bot)]; codes 
[null.metadata.userAgentTemplate,null.userAgentTemplate,null.java.lang.String,null]; 
arguments []; default message [You must supply a userAgentTemplate value 
that includes the string "@OPERATOR_CONTACT_URL@" where your 
crawlcontact URL will appear.]

Can you help? Your help is very appreciated.

-- 
Mahmoud A. Mubarak
Bibliotheca Alexandrina
